languages.text: От мрачной линзы, которой еретики выжигали глаза верным последователям своего культа, не осталось ничего, кроме кучки осколков.

traits.locale_text: От мрачной линзы, которой еретики выжигали глаза верным последователям своего культа, не осталось ничего, кроме кучки осколков.

languages.text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.
languages.original_text: От мрачной линзы, которой еретики выжигали глаза верным последователям своего культа, не осталось ничего, кроме кучки осколков.

traits.locale_text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn the eyes of devout followers of their cult.
Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn the eyes of devout followers of their cult.
Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.
Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.
Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.
Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.

languages.text: Nur ein Haufen Splitter ist von der unheimlichen Linse übrig, mit der die Ketzer frommen Kultisten die Augen ausgebrannt haben.
languages.original_text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.

traits.locale_text: Nur ein Haufen Splitter ist von der unheimlichen Linse übrig, mit der die Ketzer frommen Kultisten die Augen ausgebrannt haben.

languages.text: Il ne reste plus qu'une pile de fragments de la terrible lentille utilisée par les hérétiques pour brûler les yeux de leurs cultistes fanatiques.
languages.original_text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.

traits.locale_text: Il ne reste plus qu'une pile de fragments de la terrible lentille utilisée par les hérétiques pour brûler les yeux de leurs cultistes fanatiques.

languages.text: 邪教徒用来烧毁虔诚信徒眼睛的邪恶透镜，如今已经化成了一堆碎片。
languages.original_text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.

traits.locale_text: 邪教徒用来烧毁虔诚信徒眼睛的邪恶透镜，如今已经化成了一堆碎片。

languages.text: かつて異端者たちが敬虔な教団の目を焼くために使っていた、邪悪なレンズの破片だ。
languages.original_text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.

traits.locale_text: かつて異端者たちが敬虔な魔女団の目を焼くために使っていた、邪悪なレンズの破片だ。

languages.text: De la lente usada por los herejes para quemar los ojos de los devotos cultistas no queda más que un montón de fragmentos.
languages.original_text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.

traits.locale_text: De la lente usada por los herejes para quemar los ojos de los devotos cultistas no queda más que un montón de fragmentos.

languages.text: Kâfirlerin sadık tarikatçıların gözlerini dağlamak için kullandıkları o uğursuz lensten geriye yalnızca parçaları kalmış.
languages.original_text: Nothing but a pile of shards remains of the sinister lens that the heretics used to burn out the eyes of devout cultists.

traits.locale_text: Kâfirlerin sadık tarikatçıların gözlerini dağlamak için kullandıkları o uğursuz lensten geriye yalnızca parçaları kalmış.
